document.full_text: the european commission plans to call britain and denmark to account for dragging their feet on enforcing a controversial new law to protect people's privacy on-line, a spokesman said.
document.title: eu to warn foot-dragging states on e-privacy law
lines_and_colors: the european commission plans to call britain and denmark to account for dragging their feet on enforcing a controversial new law to protect people's privacy on-line, a spokesman said.
